titleStmt.title: A discourse of Christian religion, in sundry points preached at the merchants lecture in Broadstreet / by Thomas Cole ...
titleStmt.author: Cole, Thomas, 1627?-1697.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.R. for Thomas Cockerill ...,

notesStmt.note: Some pages are faded and have print show-through; there is loss of print on page 140 in filmed copy. Pages 130-155 photographed from British Library copy and inserted at the end.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
